ValidationRule.description: Required fields when status is changed to approved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Godkjent")&& ( ISBLANK(InterpretationMethod__c) || ISPICKVAL(AssignmentType__c, "") || ISBLANK(NumberOfInterpreters__c) || ISBLANK( EndTime__c) || ISBLANK( StartTime__c) )
